data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SEAHORSE cruise from Gravesend to York Factory started at 1780-07-01
Ship: Seahorse, Voyage: Gravesend - York Factory, 1st Observer: William Christopher (Captain), Company: Hudson Bay Company
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
